snippet: The defense lawyer Leslie Abramson will not face a criminal investigation for asking a psychiatrist to delete material from his notes during the trial of Erik Menendez, the district attorney's office has decided.    ''We've reviewed the relevant t...
lead_paragraph: The defense lawyer Leslie Abramson will not face a criminal investigation for asking a psychiatrist to delete material from his notes during the trial of Erik Menendez, the district attorney's office has decided. ''We've reviewed the relevant transcripts and have concluded that this office should not investigate this matter,'' said Sandi Gibbons, a spokeswoman for the district attorney, on Thursday.
abstract: Defense lawyer Leslie Abramson will not face criminal investigation for asking psychiatrist, Dr William Vicary, to delete material from his notes during trial of Erik Menendez (S)
